effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Void Bolt at an enemy at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dark Ascension or Void Eruption always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Hitting a Jackpot! grants you 5.0 seconds of Power Infusion. Mind Blast, Void Blast, and Void Bolt deal 10% increased damage while Power Infusion is active.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,957 to 9,725 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 295 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 894 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 894 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Eternal Cloak of Transcendence

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,872 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
